INFORMACION.Cuerpo: The first maned Moon landing was in 1969, by the spaceship Apolo 11. The crew was formed by Neil A.Armstrong, Edwin E.Aldrin Jr.and Michael Collins.When Armstrong stepped on the Moon he said one of the most famous quotes of the history of the humanity: 'That is one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind'.
